typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		col1 as short,
		col2 as short,
		col3 as boolean,
		col4 as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentTimestamp(), -1)),
	modifiedBefore: (currentTimestamp()),
	wildcardPaths:['translated/csv/*.csv']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
